policy: AWS RDS event subscription disabled for DB security groups
rule: $.Resources.*[?(@.Type == 'AWS::RDS::DBInstance')] exists and ($.Resources.*[?(@.Type == 'AWS::RDS::EventSubscription')] !exists or $.Resources.*[?(@.Type == 'AWS::RDS::EventSubscription')].Properties[?(@.Type == 'db-security-group')] anyNull or not $.Resources.*[?(@.Type == 'AWS::RDS::EventSubscription')].Properties[?(@.SourceType == 'db-security-group')].Enabled anyNull or $.Resources.*[?(@.Type == 'AWS::RDS::EventSubscription')].Properties[?(@.SourceType == 'db-security-group')].Enabled anyTrue)
